application.domain

Interface Lobby

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LobbyImpl

    public interface Lobby
extends java.rmi.Remote
    A lobby for players to be able to join.
    Author:
    Sanchez
